snippet.title: Mirthwood - Quest Trailer
snippet.description:
Inspired by Fable, Stardew Valley, Rimworld, and The Sims. Mirthwood is an enchanting open-world RPG Life Sim that blends genres to create something special. Fleeing a continent swept with war, your arrival in a new land provides a fresh start. Experience an immersive medieval fantasy world sandbox that allows you to choose who you want to be.

Wishlist On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2272900/Mirthwood/
